reviews.review: I only bought it for the G-mod textures but I soon discovered that this was better than CS:GO. Well, mostly anyway. The graphics aren't as good(since it was made the same year as Half Life 2) but the gameplay is definetly better in this one. If you're tired of tryhard punks on CS:GO then try this, you'll never want to go back!
My a father gave me a small loan of a million dollars, so i bought this. a wall/10
Le jeu est magnifique 10/10 il est mieux que Counter Strike Global Offesive :)
Bestes Spiel überhaupt... und das nach so vielen Jahren!

Наигравшись в Counter-Strike 1.6, решил попробовать поиграть в Counter-Strike: Source. По ней я до игры видел разные фраг-муви, пранк видео от arsenalgrinch. Чемпионатов я никаких по ней не видел, если честно. Наиграл, конечно, не так много, как в Team Fortress 2, но готов высказаться о ней. 
Графика. Симпатичная и детализированная, выполненная на движке Source, как и её ровесница Half-Life 2. Она и сейчас графически выглядит очень красиво, несмотря на то, что есть Counter-Strike: Global Offensive. Скины персонажей стали выглядеть лучше. 
Звук. Не изменили со времён 1.6, да и этого, собственно, не требовалось от игры. Всё же хорошо работало в 1.6, пусть и здесь работает так же хорошо. 
Геймплей. Немного изменилась механика стрельбы, как мне показалось. После 1.6 пришлось долго привыкать. Тем не менее, онлайн работает на ура. В основном, играют на de_dust2. С друзьями играть приятно. 
Несмотря на то, что ей уже больше 10 лет, она останется одной из любимых игр не только у меня, но и у многих игроков, которые провели в ней десятки, а, может, и сотни, а, может, даже и тысячи часов. Рекомендую:)

[h1]★ ★ ★ ★ -[/h1]
One of the greatest online multiplayer FPS games of the old and also most of the current generations, there is a single player mode to do a standard match with bots but the true value in this game is freely mod-able community servers, which has kept the game alive and feeling fresh to players for ages, i'd give it 5 stars but the only thing is its lacking in value if you dont have an internet connection all the time. (i wish they also kept the "Missions" system like in Conition Zero, then devs could map new maps with bot enemies and an objective for that too so ppl can play through together or solo)

You can spend hours and days on end looking through the list of servers running all kinds of game modes, Jail Break, Gun Game, Zombie Escape, Zombie Riot, Surf, to name a few and even some servers that dont have anything to do with shooting, like MiniGames servers where its a course you have to maneuver through without falling.

This is why ppl love / loved Valve games cuz they generally made a base platform game that actually didnt have much content of its own but ran well and the engine was open ended, while supplying each player with the tools to make content and plugins for the game to grow and evolve the gameplay however the player base saw fit.

Garrys Mod is an adaptation to CSS mixed with a little HL2 so if you like the other Source Engine games then CSS is for you, CS:GO has community servers as well but with all the hype of the "matchmaking" modes nobody even looks at the Mod servers, so if you like the gameplay change of community servers then CSS is for you, but if you like the standard style multiplayer matches like in Call of Duty then you probably wanna go for CS:Global Offensive.

-

P.S. I used to run an old laptop with a 2.14 Ghz single core AMD Sempron CPU and an AMD Radeon 4200 with 320MB and 3GB of ram, with a 2x2 ft box fan pointed up on my table with my laptop on top to cool it xP so if your systems a little better you should run things fine on all low settings as long as your system doesnt get too hot, and remember that with laptops especially and gaming machines in general that heat is always your enemy.

Ah, yes. Counter Strike: Source. If you buy this game, you will want to blow something up. Cause there is no reg, the graphics are mediocre, etc, etc. But in the end you will just keep coming back, asking yourself, "Why, why do I torture myself with such an annoying game?".

Would torture myself again 10/10
